page.title: 10EDUCATION IN EAST CORNWALL
page.content: The school at SOUTH HILL is closed. Children in that parish mostly attend schools in Callington,3 miles away. ST0KE CLIMSLAND PRIMARY SCOOL is outside the area of survey,but is attended by most children within it. The majority of older children are taken by bus to Callington Comprehensive School.Asmall number of girls of all ages are taken by car on a parents roster to St.Joseph's Convent at Launceston,9 miles away.A few boys attend the Public School of Kelly College at Tavistock,11 miles away,or as boarders at Truro School. There is a flourishing Play Group at Venterdon financed by parents and also run by parents under the guidance of a paid, professional Nursery teacher.
